title: The State We're In at 25: reconsidering progressive politics
itunes:author: Will Hutton, Alison McGovern MP, Sir Geoff Mulgan
description: Contributor(s): Will Hutton, Alison McGovern MP, Sir Geoff Mulgan | Are the problems faced by the UK different now? And what lessons are there in progressive renewal? To mark the book's 25th anniversary, this event will bring together Will Hutton with leading political thinkers to update the work and consider parallels between the UK politics of the mid-90s and now.
